backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, access control, categories, products, variants, and cart operations with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across layout, catalog, product, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, theming variables, and dark mode rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router configuration defining all storefront and admin routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard component that checks admin status and blocks access with an error message if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button managing authentication state and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter basic profile info and saves it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandMa: Renders the brand logo image and text for Mixora.
frontend/src/components/catalog/Featured: Shows a grid of featured categories with images linking to category pages.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Displays product details including name, price, category badge, and a wishlist button, linking to the product page.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with navigation links, support options, and branding credits.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Provides the main navigation bar with category links, cart/wishlist/account icons, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the overall site layout including header, footer, routed content, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/product/ReviewSe: Handles displaying reviews and submitting new ones with rating and comment input.
frontend/src/components/product/VariantS: Allows selecting product variants by color or size using badge-style selectors.
frontend/src/components/support/WhatsApp: Opens a prefilled WhatsApp chat using configured support contact details.
frontend/src/config/support.ts: Exports WhatsApp support number and default message configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, status, and stored identity using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates document title and optional meta description when pages load.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for categories, products, cart, reviews, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Creates Stripe checkout sessions via a backend actor and returns the session URL.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays account dashboard with profile info, admin link, and login prompts based on user authentication.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin table listing product categories with loading state support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard displaying basic metrics and quick‑action guidance.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides the admin layout with navigation sidebar, route guarding, and outlet rendering.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays a simple admin orders page with placeholder text and sets page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Lists products, provides a dialog to add new products, and handles form submission via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Shows a placeholder admin support inbox page and sets page metadata.
Allows assigning user roles through a form using backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StripeSetupPane: Shows Stripe configuration status and form to set secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows shopping cart items, allows quantity updates and removal, and computes subtotal.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Lists products for a specific category with loading skeletons and page metadata updates.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout form handling shipping info, payment selection, cart summaries, and Stripe session creation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero banner, promo section, and featured product categories.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays user's orders or prompts login if unauthenticated, with empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows payment failure message with actions to retry checkout or return to cart.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays successful payment confirmation and navigation to orders or homepage.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail view with variants, reviews, rating, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Support contact form with validation and WhatsApp option for customer inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows wishlist or prompts login, with empty-state messaging when no items exist.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom themes, colors, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current e‑commerce build plan, including scope, architecture notes, authentication, payments, and category restrictions. Records existing implemented features, known issues, and versioning metadata.
